description: Deal damage to yourself equal to target Creature's remaining DEF, then destroy it.

name: InstiGator
description: When InstiGator enters play, move target opposing Creature into InstiGator's Lane (if empty).

name: InvestiGator
description: FLOOP >>> Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Play a revealed Teamwork for free, and then discard the other cards.

name: IrriGator
description: While IrriGator is on an Icylands Landscape, it has +2 ATK.

name: Jake
description: Creatures on facedown Landscapes you control have +2 ATK.

name: Jake [Doubles Tournament]
description: Once during your turn, when a Creature you control damages an opponent, you may deal 1 Damage to target Creature in one of your Lanes.

name: Jinx
description: Choose two players. Each reveals a random card from their hand. If their costs don't match, they discard those cards.

name: Jinxed Parrotrooper
description: When Jinxed Parrotrooper enters play, move it to any empty Landscape. It cannot be replaced. At the start of your turn, discard a card.

name: Kernel Queen
description: Kernel Queen has +1 ATK for each Flooped Creature you control.

name: King Baby
description: Pay 1 Action, FLOOP >>> Deal 1 Damage to target Creature for each Cornfield Landscape you control.

name: Knit Kitty
description: Knit Kitty is affected by Buildings on adjacent Landscapes.

name: Kung Fu Power

name: Lady Beetle
description: At the start of your turn, you may return a Creature you control with 2 or fewer DEF remaining to its owner's hand.

name: Lady Rainicorn
description: If you return two or more Creatures to your hand from play or your discard pile during your turn, heal 2 HP.

name: Learning Center
description: Learning Center gains the game text of Buildings you control in adjacent Lanes (but not their names).

name: Legion of Earlings
description: When Legion of Earlings enters play, you may return target Creature in this Lane to its owner's hand.

name: Lemongrab
description: At the start of your Fight Phase, if you have 1 or more empty Landscapes, gain 1 HP. (Can't go over 25.)

name: Life Beater Gnome
description: FLOOP >>> Deal 1 Damage to each opposing Creature that is on a SandyLands Landscape.

name: Lifeguard Lobster
description: Each time another creature enters play during your turn, you must heal 1 Damage from another Creature.

name: Lime Slimey
description: If you control 3 or more different Landscape types when Lime Slimey enters play, draw 2 cards.

name: Little Freezy
description: +1 DEF for each different Landscape type you control.

name: Log Knight
description: FLOOP >>> Put a Building from your hand below this Lane. (If it doesn't already have one.)

name: Log Rhythm

name: Lonely Panda
description: When Lonely Panda enters play, if you control no other Creatures, draw a card.

name: Longboard Lobster
description: +1 ATK for each Useless Swamp Landscapes in play.

name: Lost Golem
description: Lost Golem costs 1 less to play for each other Creature you have played this turn.

name: Loveable Lamb

name: Lt. Mushroom

name: Lucky Penny

name: Lumbercaddy

name: Lunchpad
description: FLOOP >>> Draw a card for each Creature that entered play onto this Landscape this turn.

name: Mace Stump

name: Magenapping

name: Magic Lamp
description: Each of your Creatures has +2 ATK this turn while attacking a Creature that is on a SandyLands Landscape.

name: Magic Man

name: Magic Ring Ding
description: Each of your Creatures has +1 ATK this turn for every 5 cards in your discard pile.

name: Man-Witch

name: Mantle Masher

name: Marceline

name: Master of Disguise

name: Matchy Matchy

name: Mausoleum
description: Your Creature in this Lane has +1 DEF for every 5 cards in your discard pile.

name: Mint Chocouflage

name: Mocha Launcher

name: Mouthball
description: +2 DEF for every 5 cards in your discard pile.

name: Ms. Fluff

name: Music Mallard
description: FLOOP >>> Draw a card. If Music Mallard has 5 or more Damage on it, draw an additional card.

name: Necromancer

name: Nice Ice Baby

description: FLOOP >>> Deal 2 Damage to target opposing Creature in this Lane.

description: Weakened Warrior comes into play exhausted and does not ready at the start of your turn. Whenever Weakened Warrior changes Lanes, ready it.

name: Weary Trading Post
description: FLOOP >> Move an exhausted Creature you control to this Landscape (if empty).

name: Well-Dressed Wolf
description: Well-Dressed Wolf has +1 ATK while attacking a Creature that is on a Cornfield Landscape.

name: Windmill of Health
description: While your Creature in this Lane has no Damage on it, it has +2 ATK.

name: Witch Slap
description: Target opponent discards down to 5 cards, and then takes 1 Damage for each card discarded this way.

name: Witch Way
description: Each of your Creature that is on a Useless Swamp Landscape has +2 ATK this turn.

name: Woad Blood
description: Each Creature that changed Lanes this turn has +2 ATK this turn.

name: Woad Mobile Home
description: FLOOP >>> Move a Creature in an empty adjacent Lane to this Lane (if empty).

name: Woad Talisman
description: Target Blue Plains Creature you control has +2 ATK this turn.

name: Woadic Chief
description: Woadic Chief has +2 ATK this turn for each Spell you have played this turn.

name: Woadic Enchantress
description: Creatures in this Lane cannot use Floop abilities.

name: Woadic Marauder
description: When Woadic Marauder changes Lanes during a turn, draw a card.

name: Woadic Matriarch
description: Woadic Matriarch has +1 ATK for each Rainbow Creature you control.

name: Woadic Ring Leader
description: At the start of your turn, move Woadic Ring Leader to an empty Landscape you control. If you cannot, destroy it.

name: Woadic Weirdo
description: FLOOP >>> Reveal a card from your hand. That card becomes a Rainbow card until the end of your turn. (It has no Landscape type).

name: X-Large Spirit Soldier
description: Each adjacent Creature has +1 ATK.

name: Yellow Gnome
description: FLOOP >>> Deal 1 Damage to each opposing Creature that is on a NiceLands Landscape.

name: Yellow Lighthouse
description: At the start of your turn, each players who controls a Creature in this Lane draws a card.

name: Yellow Slimey
description: While you control 3 or more different Landscape types, Yellow Slimey has +3 ATK.

name: Young ZebraCorn Husker
description: If Young ZebraCorn Husker leaves play during your Fight Phase, you may put it on top of your deck.

name: ZaZo's Magic Seeds
description: Target SandyLands Creature has +2 ATK this turn for each Creature that entered play into an adjacent Lane this turn.
